services.name: Copernicus Atmosphere Monitoring Service (CAMS)
services.description: Provides atmospheric composition and air quality data derived primarily from Sentinel-5P and other sources.

services.name: Copernicus Marine Environment Monitoring Service (CMEMS)
services.description: Provides oceanographic data and products from Sentinel 1,2,3,6 and in-situ sensors.

services.name: Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS)
services.description: Provides global land monitoring data derived from Sentinel 1 and 2 and other sources.

services.name: Copernicus Climate Change Service (C3S)
services.description: Provides authoritative information on past, present, and future global climate using Sentinel reference products.

services.name: Copernicus Emergency Management Service (EMS)
services.description: Provides disaster and emergency mapping from Sentinel satellites and other sources.

portals.name: CDSE Portal
portals.description: Access to Sentinel 1,2,3,5P and Contributing Missions, visualization and cloud processing.

portals.name: WEkEO Portal
portals.description: Access to Sentinel reference products, subsets of Copernicus services and other mission data.

portals.name: NASA Earth Data Portal
portals.description: Access to NASA satellite data and derived products, including Landsat and NOAA missions.
